meanings: a[one] step, a pace, a run

meanings.meaning: one step forward, two steps back

vlive.korean: "서로 한걸음씩 다가갈수록 하늘은 어두워지고..." With each step they take, the sky darkens... 듣기 View video Red Velvet : ReVe Festival FINALE EP. 1
vlive.english: With each step they take, the sky darkens...

vlive.korean: [드라마 촬영 마치고 한걸음에 달려오심!] 안녕하세요. [Came right after his drama shoot!] Hello. 듣기 View video 포토피플(PHOTO PEOPLE) : Ep.01 사진작가가 되기로 마음먹다
vlive.english: [Came right after his drama shoot!] Hello.

vlive.korean: 엄마한테 연락을 했더니 엄마가 한 걸음에 달려와주셨죠. so I called my mom and she came in a heartbeat. 듣기 View video HOONION : [Review] LANEIGE layering cover cushion 라네즈 레이어링 커버 쿠션
vlive.english: so I called my mom and she came in a heartbeat.

vlive.korean: 나는 이미 그 꿈에 한 걸음 더 가까워졌다고 믿는다. I believe I am already a step closer to the dream. 듣기 View video MOMO X : [모모문고] 여자친구 유주 편
vlive.english: I believe I am already a step closer to the dream.

vlive.korean: 그렇게 이현비라는 아이에게 한 걸음 다가가게 됐다. And I went one step closer to the girl named Lee Hyunbi. 듣기 View video 플레이리스트 (Playlist) : 2008년 우리가 썸 타던 방법 [고, 백다이어리 파일럿] - EP.01
vlive.english: And I went one step closer to the girl named Lee Hyunbi.

examples.korean: It’s only a small improvement, but at least it’s a step in the right direction. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그것은 작은 진전이지만 적어도 올바른 방향으로 나아가는 한 걸음이다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: It’s only a small improvement, but at least it’s a step in the right direction. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: She took a step nearer. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그녀가 한 걸음 더 가까이 다가갔다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: She took a step nearer. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: She moved a step closer to me. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그녀가 내게로 한 걸음 더 가까이 다가왔다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: She moved a step closer to me. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: It’s time to stand back and look at your career so far. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 이제 한 걸음 뒤로 물러나 지금까지 당신이 걸어 온 길을 살펴보아야 할 때이다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: It’s time to stand back and look at your career so far. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: The new drug is a major step forward in the treatment of the disease. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그 신약은 그 질병의 치료를 향해 나아가는 주요한 한 걸음이다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The new drug is a major step forward in the treatment of the disease. Add to Wordbook
